import { CenterFocusStrong } from '@mui/icons-material' import React , {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import InvestmentService from '../services/InvestmentService' import "./ListInvestmentComponent.css" const ListInvestmentComponent = () => { const [investments, setinvestments] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { InvestmentService.getAllInvestments().then((Response) =>{ setinvestments(Response.data); }) }, []) return (

Liste des investissements

{investment.name} {investment.start} {investment.capital} {investment.actual} {investment.benefice} Modifier

) } export default ListInvestmentComponent
